script.py:
from apng_core.db import fetchall

with initDbSession(application='bank').cursor() as c:
    c.execute("""
        select * from table(colvir.t_log.fGetLog())
    """)
        
    d = fetchall(c)

    log_text = ''        
    for l in d:
        log_text += '%s\n' % l['TEXT']

data = log_text
